Change Management

Our Perspective

Kotter’s Model of Change Source: “Accelerate!”, Harvard Business Review (2012), John Kotter

Our Approach

Kotter’s 8-step methodology:

  1. Create A Sense of Urgency
  2. Build A Guiding Coalition
  3. Form A Strategic Vision
  4. Enlist A Volunteer Army
  5. Enable Action By Removing Barriers
  6. Generate Short-Term Wins
  7. Sustain Acceleration
  8. Institute Change
DL Strategy Consulting is led by Nigel Dalziel, an experienced strategist who has led consulting projects within the strategy practices at PwC (Strategy&) and Deloitte (MonitorDeloitte) and the Corporate Strategy Group at Fidelity Investments. He earned an MBA from the Tuck School at Dartmouth College, where he was named an Edward Tuck Scholar. He also holds a Masters in Computer and Information Technology from the University of Pennsylvania and a Bachelors in Mathematics from Bristol University in the UK.
